name: Scrabble (itch) (k4gi)
description:
You're riding the elevator into the depths... But it's stopped running! And the zombies are coming! You need to find the generator on this level and fill it with enough fuel to get the elevator running again.

I made this game for 7 Day Roguelike 2022 

Controls:
Movement with WASD
Start generator with E
Attack with Left Mouse Button
Aim gun with Right Mouse Button
